thread.title: Rio athletes to be honoured
thread.title_full: Rio athletes to be honoured - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Rio athletes to be honoured
text:
NEW DELHI: Subroto Cup officials have organised a charity event on Thursday where athletes Inderjeet Singh, Manish Rawat and Narsingh Pancham Yadav will also be honoured for their Rio Olympics qualification.
It wasn't clear whether the Subroto committee would extend the Olympic team any monetary benefit, they did not deny it either. The sportsmen will be present on behalf of the entire Olympic team.
The charity event will bank on Pele's marketability, who will autograph items that will be auctioned at the event, and proceeds from which will be used for grassroots football, and will not be shared with AIFF. "We will use the money the best way we see fit. This competition is into its 56th year and you can see the number of players who have participated in this event and then gone on to represent the national team. We want it to become even better," an organiser said.
